name: Xolotl Playtest Demo
description:
The gods needed to give light to the world. By sacrificing two of them, they created the sun, and the moon. But thy didn't move. They needed one last sacrifice. And the chosen one was Xolotl.

Xolotl did not want to die. But he was chosen to be sacrificed. Instead, he ran away, and morphed into an animal, the axolotl, to hide and survive. Now he must get to the Pantheon of the gods, and awake his true power to defeat his adversaries.

Hey everyone!! I wanted you to play a prototype 'demo' for my upcoming 2D Open-World game! It's just to collect feedback on controls, physics, etc. This 'demo' does not include any story elements, but the context is explained above. If you could play this and give feedback, it would be highly appreciated. Thanks!

Escape / Start to Pause.

W / Up Arrow /  Y (on Xbox Controller) to interact. 

The rest is explained in-game.
